data.meta_description: With #Fujitsu's help, Palkeet implemented SAP S/4HANA, improving its reporting capabilities and efficiency in order-to-cash processes. Learn more about this‚Ä¶
data.text:
In a quest to improve user experience, Palkeet, The Finnish Government Shared Services Centre for Finance and HR, decided to boost its digital transformation. With our help, Palkeet implemented SAP S/4HANA, improving its reporting capabilities and efficiency in order-to-cash processes. Learn more about this project here: https://lnkd.in/gGuNrnVC #Government #Finance #DigitalTransformation #SAP

Transform, standardise, and harmonise your processes globally to comply locally ‚Äì faster and more efficiently ‚Äì with the SAP Document and Reporting Compliance solution. Gain insights on efficient handling of local regulations in the SAP Document and Reporting Compliance Virtual Summit 2023. Join us on September 26 and 27 and find out how SAP can help you thrive in the current business climate. Secure your spot now: https://imsap.co/6049PodHT #SAPGoGlobal #SAPLocalization

If you want to know how to prepare your SAP S/4HANA transformation project - register yourself for tomorrow's webcast. Looking forward to present together with Julia Meyer and Robert Huefler how we support the preparation phase of your S/4HANA project. As always in life - preparation is key to success and in this case the chance to unlock value. If you haven‚Äôt signed up already, register yourself (see links below in comments, all sessions in German language only). If you have missed the first webcast of our webcast series on SAP Signavio for SAP S/4HANA transformation projects - no worries, you can find in the links below to the recording as well. Manuel Saenger Julia Meyer Robert Huefler Regina Kloo

Are you facing SAP authorization challenges? Look no further than Silotu Consulting! Our innovative solutions are designed to address your unique business needs, ensuring seamless access control and compliance. Take the first step towards a secure SAP environment today. Connect with us at silotuconsulting.co.za #SAP #AuthorizationChallenges #AccessControl #Compliance #data #new #ai #viral #business #grow

Here are some tips for choosing the right SAP GTS US FTZ implementation partner based on some lessons learned in the field. For companies embarking on journey to a US Foreign Trade Zone these lessons provide a roadmap of key considerations. Organizational readiness for US ACE customs self-filing, Warehouse receiving, issuing and manufacturing processes, adjusting longstanding logistics supply chain practices oriented towards goods cleared at the border to now work for receipts into FTZs are all part of that consideration set. Happy reading! #Ropaar #SAPGTS #TradeManagement #FTZSuccess #USFTZ #globaltrademanagement
